flawed_nl_solution:
In the first round, Richard knocked down 70 + 15 = <<70+15=84>>84 pins.
In the second round, Patrick knocked down 84 x 2 = <<84*2=168>>168 pins.
In the second round, Richard knocked down 168 - 3 = <<168-3=165>>165 pins.
In total, Patrick knocked down 70 + 168 = <<70+168=238>>238 pins
In total, Richard knocked down 84 + 165 = <<84+165=249>>249 pins
Richard knocked down 249 - 238 = <<249-238=11>>11 pins more than Patrick.
